uri.description: A template URI pointing to a tile metadata JSON file for each subtree. The URI of each tile metadata file is substituted with the subtrees's global level, x, y, and z (OCTREE only). Tile metadata is a JSON file containing property arrays conforming to the given class and containing metadata for all available tiles in the subtree. Tile metadata is tightly packed; the index of a tile's metadata is determined by the number of 1 bits that precede the tile in the tile availability bitstream. The JSON structure is further outlined in 3DTILES_tile_metadata.external.schema.json
